Utilities for MinOptMax and LengthRangeProperty.

static void extendMinimum(MinOptMax mom, int len)
          Extends the minimum length to the given length if necessary, and adjusts opt and max accordingly.

Extends the minimum length to the given length if necessary, and adjusts opt and max accordingly.
